column3: Maintainers: would you mind if I tacked on a few README changes to this PR? I'm thinking of addressing the posthumous comments here:\n- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21711#pullrequestreview-710604005\n- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21711#pullrequestreview-710760594
See #22527 for more tidy-ups to pull into this PR? The title of this PR could be changed, as it wasn't clear to me that these were being addressed.
utACK f0e00d0173087b29e0a1045a4073a292c55bd954. The current output is rather confusing.
